price: 13. Ils ne trouveront point d’intercesseurs parmi les associés (qu’ils prêtaient à Allah). Et ils renieront ces associés.
arabic: وَلَمۡ يَكُن لَّهُم مِّن شُرَكَآئِهِمۡ شُفَعَٰٓؤُاْ وَكَانُواْ بِشُرَكَآئِهِمۡ كَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: walam yakun lahum min shurakāihim shufaʿāu wakānū bishurakāihim kāfirīna
